Message:
...Ah yes, there was
another witch I met.

She was living on the
outskirts of some village,

doing favors for villagers
who occasionally visited her.

So, I asked her why
she bent over backwards
for riffraff who’d only
come to her when
they’re in trouble.
And you know what she said?

“Because I just can’t help but
love the village I was born in.”

She must’ve also known that
the villagers feared her though.

When old age finally claimed her,
those villagers all breathed
a collective sigh of relief.

...That’s a sight that
I will never, ever, forget.
